special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 2] Mill three cards, then you may return an artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
New card — Replaced Dashed with Pepper

Swapped to make a more appealing common black II recipe. Also opens up room for a duress or mind rot effect at common
